resources.string: The password must be at least 8 characters.
The current password is not correct
The new passwords do not match
This action requires configuration at 192.168.10.1:3000. See the guide.
Enter the domain associated with your public IP (DDNS) and a name for this connection.
Scan this QR with the new device
Scan this QR with the new device
No response from the QR generator
Measure your connection speed. We’ll accept the license and privacy policy if this is the first time.
This may take a few seconds.
The device will lose network access.
The device will regain network access.
It is good practice to check each day if there are new devices.
It is good practice to save devices with a recognizable name.
If you do not recognize a device, it is important to block it.
Here you can search for the device you want to modify.
You can use the search bar to find the device you want to modify.
You can also apply filters to make it easier to find.
If you want to see blocked devices, tap "Show Blocked Devices".
To view allowed devices again, tap "Show Allowed Devices".
If you tap the device, you can view and modify its data.
If you do not recognize a device, it is important to block it.
Here you can modify the device information.
You can change the device name by tapping the edit button at the top right. Keep in mind that the device name is only changed in your app. Other users will not see this change.
If the device type was not detected correctly, you can change it by tapping the edit button on the device icon. This change only affects your app.
Select what type of device it is and tap the Save button to apply the changes.
Select what type of device it is.
Select what type of device it is and tap the Save button to apply the changes.
If you want to prevent a device from using the internet during a specific time period and on specific days of the week, tap the "+" button in Schedules.
Here you will see the existing rules.
You can delete them by tapping the "x" on the rule.
To add a rule, tap the “Add rule” button.
Select the start time and end time of the block (green and red circles respectively).
To prevent Wi-Fi access, tap the “Block device” button at the bottom of the page.
To allow access again, tap “Unblock device”.
Here you block all devices at once.
To limit the hours during which devices can connect to the router, tap the “+” symbol in the “Schedules” section.
Here you will see all the rules already created.
If you want to limit access for all devices during a specific time slot and specific days of the week, tap the “Add rule” button.
Select the time when connection is blocked and the time when it is allowed again.
Select the days of the week on which you want the rule to take effect.
Then add the rule with the “Add” button.
If you want to remove the rule, tap the “x” to the right of it.
To block access to a website, tap the “+” symbol in the “Filters” section.
Here you will see all the rules already created.
If you want to block access for all devices to a website, tap the “Add rule” button.
Enter the domain you want to block (e.g., elpais.com).
Then add the rule with the “Add” button.
If you want to remove the rule, tap the “x” to the right of it.
It is good practice to check each day if there are new devices.
It is good practice to save devices with a recognizable name.
If you do not recognize a device, it is important to block it.
Configure your network and review the connected devices.
Tap the edit button to the right of the router alias to rename it quickly.
Here you can change the language that will be displayed in the app.
Select the language you want the app to use.
Here all the routers you have saved will appear. In addition, the status of each router and whether you can access it is shown.
When a new router is detected, an icon will indicate that it is new.
The green circular symbol means the router is accessible.
If no icon appears, it means the router is not connected and is not accessible.
If you have never connected to a router and you are also the first user to connect to the router with the app, you will be asked to set the access password.
Warning: This password is used to sign in with the app; it is not the same as the one used to connect to the router for internet access.
Important: Save this password because other users will need it to connect through the app.
If someone has already connected before, it will ask you for the existing password, which must be provided by the user who set it up.
Tap the connected router to configure it.
There is no router connected right now.
You can change the language by tapping Language.
If you want to browse without ads, you can enable this feature.
Toggle the switch to enable the ad blocker.
If this is the first time you turn it on, enter the following in the browser: 192.168.10.1:3000
Create a username and password with at least 8 characters
Scroll down a bit and tap "Save"
All set—enjoy a safer, ad-free internet.
If you want to configure your network from outside your home, it is important to set up this feature.
First, let’s see what your public IP is; to do this, go to www.cual-es-mi-ip.net.
Write down the number that appears there. We will use it shortly.
Now go to www.noip.com to set up the “path” to your router—don’t worry, it’s safe.
Create your account by tapping "Sign Up" and creating your account; it’s important to save your username and password.
Once in your account, tap “DDNS and quick access”.
Tap “Create hostname” to create the domain.
Enter the name you want to appear in your URL (“path”), e.g., your-url.
Note the final URL; in this example it is your-url.ddns.net.
Install WireGuard on the device you want to use to configure the router from outside the network.
If this is the first time, you can add an access point right away. Give it any name you want and the URL you created in No-IP, then tap “Activate VPN”.

We’ll use this QR to establish the connection using the WireGuard app.
If you are going to set up the VPN on the same device, take a screenshot.
Tap the “+” button to add the connection.
Tap “Scan from QR code” and scan the QR code generated by the app.
You can enable the connection by toggling the switch.
Or disable it by toggling the switch again.
With the VPN active and from a different network than your home, if you open the app you will see that it is connected through the VPN.
If you already have at least one access point, you will see the option to add another.
Or you can delete an existing access point so it can no longer sign in.
Tap the access point you want to delete.
And tap "Delete" to remove that access point.
Great, now you can enjoy using the app anywhere in the world.
Could not display the image (invalid base64).
You need to update the router; not doing so poses a considerable risk
